message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $10,000. I understand its worth to you is $8,000, but I hope this offer presents a mutually beneficial solution. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
